         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17345595">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17345595">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17345595" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17345596">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17345596">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17345596">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17345596">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons
           </span>
           <strong>
            &nbsp;
           </strong>
           found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//">
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17345596" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>

          <h2>
           Reference works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17345597">
          <div id="boxatt17345597" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20417751">
              <a id="link_20417751" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.oed.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20417751,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Civilization As We (Think) We Know It', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20417751}); ">
               OED Online (Oxford English Dictionary)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               (via library subscription)
               <br />
               The premier source for history of words in the English language, available via library subscription.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>

          <h2>
           Popular sources: newspapers and magazines
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17345598">
          <div id="boxatt17345598" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20417779">
              <a id="link_20417779" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20417779,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Civilization As We (Think) We Know It', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335038}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Includes the full text of many popular magazines including Time, New Yorker, etc.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>

           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17345599">
          <div id="boxatt17345599" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20417814">
              <a id="link_20417814" href="http://www.google.com/books" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20417814,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Civilization As We (Think) We Know It', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12378397}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Previews of many books. May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20417733">
              <a id="link_20417733" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20417733,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Civilization As We (Think) We Know It', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344495}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Catalog of books and documents in libraries throughout the world. Use in conjunction with interlibrary loan.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17345600">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17345600">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17345600">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17345600">
          <div id="boxatt17345600" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20417735">
              <a id="link_20417735" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20417735,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Civilization As We (Think) We Know It', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618737}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Good starting place for journals from every discipline. Includes the full text of about 3000 journals. Limit to "peer reviewed" to find only scholarly articles. Back issues of journals begin as early as 1990. Recent issues may not be included yet, due to publisher agreement. Journals held in Trexler Library are marked accordingly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20417736">
              <a id="link_20417736" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20417736,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Civilization As We (Think) We Know It', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343016}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Archive (five year old and prior) of scholarly journals across the discipllines. Search engine is a bit clunky.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20417850">
              <a id="link_20417850" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?authtype=ip,uid&amp;profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20417850,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Civilization As We (Think) We Know It', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329245}); ">
               America: History &amp; Life with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database for U.S. history.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20417738">
              <a id="link_20417738" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20417738,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Civilization As We (Think) We Know It', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12456990}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database for non-U.S. history.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20417881">
              <a id="link_20417881" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=mzh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20417881,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Civilization As We (Think) We Know It', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717120}); ">
               MLA International Bibliography
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database for literary criticism, film criticism, and theater criticism.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20417885">
              <a id="link_20417885" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=psyh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20417885,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Civilization As We (Think) We Know It', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12326504}); ">
               PsycINFO
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database for psychology
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20417887">
              <a id="link_20417887" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/socabs/advanced?accountid=40980" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20417887,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Civilization As We (Think) We Know It', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12811735}); ">
               Sociological Abstracts
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Standard index for sociology.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17345762">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17345762">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17345762">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Search engines
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17345762">
          <div id="boxatt17345762" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20417899">
              <a id="link_20417899" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20417899,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Civilization As We (Think) We Know It', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20016760}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Non-selective. One of the largest web crawlers.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20417928">
              <a id="link_20417928" href="http://scholar.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20417928,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Civilization As We (Think) We Know It', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19855349}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An open-access web crawler that looks for content it identifies as "scholarly." Emphasis is on books and journal articles. Intended as a "federated search" to search across disciplines (weighted toward sciences and social sciences). Not always full text. Check our Journal Locator (see above) to see if Muhlenberg has access to the full text.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4707877" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17345601">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17345601">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17345601">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Creating a bibliography
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17345601">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17345601" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17345602">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17345602">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17345602">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17345602">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17345602" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
